resources.string: Welcome to SailRight, the sailor\'s app.\nClick below to get what you need, fast.
Click on a topic below to refresh your knowledge.
Below are boats with checklists available. Click on a boat to review its list.
Below are a collection of useful sailing knots. Click on a knot to learn more.
Version information for this edition of the software.
If you\'re reading this... Congratulations!\nYou\'re using an alpha release of our cool new software.\nEnjoy!
There are 5 or more life jackets oboard.
There is a Type IV flotation device oboard.
There is at least one flare on board.
There is a medical kit onbard and is has not yet expired.
